content: also on jiffy ball bands lion brand pattern # cjif-bobbleblanket skill level easy level 2 jiffy® article #450 4 balls solids or 5 balls prints crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm special stitch bobble work blanket and hood separately attach hood to blanket to finish see hooded bobble baby blanket knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hooded-bobble-baby-blanket-knit
